title: Chile Consumer Price Index (CPI)
description: Consumer Price Index CPI in Chile increased to 127.41 points in October from 126.75 points in September of 2022. Consumer Price Index CPI in Chile averaged 32.79 points from 1950 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 127.41 points in October of 2022 and a record low of 0 points in February of 1950. In Chile, the Consumer Price Index or CPI measures changes in the prices paid by consumers for a basket of goods and services. This page provides - Chile Consumer Price Index (CPI) - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: National Institute of Statistics, Chile
